query.statement: UPDATE SAPHEE.ZCST131 SET CS131_YYM = #YYM# ,CS131_YDT = SAPHEE.GET_LAST_DAY(CAST(#YYM# AS VARCHAR(18))||CAST(#YDT# AS VARCHAR(6))) ,CS131_NDT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) ,CS131_CSJ = #G_USER_ID# ,AEDAT = HEX(CURRENT DATE) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H ,AEZEIT = HEX(CURRENT TIME) -- BS ETL 연계를 위한 식별컬럼 추가. 2020.11.19 Han J.H WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS131_UPN = #UPN# AND CS131_CST= #CST# AND CS131_GNO = #GNO# AND CS131_HNO = 'Z99' AND CS131_GND = 'E' AND CS131_MYM = #JYM# AND CS131_MYB = ''
